SourcePropertyItem.description:
An object storing the source for a specified property.

The property is a reference to the property element within this Feature, and will be
referenced using JSON Pointer Notation RFC 6901 (
https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/rfc6901/).
The source dataset for that referenced property will be specified in the overture list of approved sources from the Overture Data Working Group that contains the relevant metadata for that dataset including license source organization.

between.description: Linear reference range [start, end] where 0.0 <= start < end <= 1.0
between.title: Between

license.description: License name. This should be a valid SPDX license identifier when available. If the license is NULL, contact the data provider for more license information.
license.title: License

record_id.description: Refers to the specific record within the dataset that was used.
record_id.title: Record Id

update_time.description: Timestamp when the feature was last updated
update_time.title: Update Time

SourcePropertyItem.title: SourcePropertyItem

description:
Connectors create physical connections between segments.

Connectors are compatible with GeoJSON Point features.

id.description: A feature ID. This may be an ID associated with the Global Entity Reference System (GERS) if—and-only-if the feature represents an entity that is part of GERS.
id.title: Id

^ext_.*$.description:
Additional top-level properties are allowed if prefixed by `ext_`.

This feature is a on a deprecation path and will be removed once the schema is
fully migrated to Pydantic.

sources.description: The array of source information for the properties of a given feature, with each entry being a source object which lists the property in JSON Pointer notation and the dataset approved sources from the Overture Data Working Group that contains the relevant metadata for that dataset including license source organization.
sources.title: Sources

title: connector
